thread.title: Charlotte Crosby left 'fuming' after letting Stephen Bear give her a TATTOO
thread.title_full: Charlotte Crosby left 'fuming' after letting Stephen Bear give her a TATTOO

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Charlotte Crosby left 'fuming' after letting Stephen Bear give her a TATTOO
text:
Charlotte Crosby left 'fuming' after letting Stephen Bear give her a TATTOO The Celebs Go Dating star is apparently regretting her decision Share Get celebs     
Charlotte Crosby and Stephen Bear have apparently taken their relationship to the next level. 
The pair are working on their new show, Just Tattoo of Us, which sees couples get themselves inked by their partners. 
But there's one big twist - they don't get to see what they're getting tattooed on their body until it's all done. 
With Bear and Charlotte getting together while filming the MTV series, they apparently figured they'd be hypocrites if they didn't give it a go themselves. Charlotte and Bear have struck up a romance The pair have got new tattoos (Photo: MTV) 
But Charlotte didn't count on Bear being his usual self and making fun of the entire thing. 
A show insider told Heat: "Bear decided to tattoo a half-cheetah, half-bear face on Charlotte's lower back. Read More Charlotte Crosby FARTS in Stephen Bear's face in hilariously disgusting Snapchat video 
"When she found out she was not happy." 
While they’ve stayed coy about what exactly is going on with their romance, Bear recently dropped his heaviest hint yet that it may not be an entirely platonic relationship. They can't stay away from each other (Photo: MTV) 
"Charlotte, honestly, it's nice 'cause she's fit. It helps, if she was ugly, I wouldn't really enjoy my time here,” he told MTV News . 
"And she's good at kissing… I've said too much!" Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
